title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
simple_desc: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.
stars: ['Shameik Moore', 'Hailee Steinfeld', 'Brian Tyree Henry', 'Luna Lauren Velez']

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
simple_desc: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
simple_desc: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
simple_desc: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
simple_desc: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

title: The Green Mile
simple_desc: A tale set on death row in a Southern jail, where gentle giant John possesses the mysterious power to heal people's ailments. When the lead guard, Paul, recognizes John's gift, he tries to help stave off the condemned man's execution.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
simple_desc: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

title: Spirited Away
simple_desc: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, a world where humans are changed into beasts.

title: It's a Wonderful Life
simple_desc: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
simple_desc: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

title: Your Name.
simple_desc: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies. Things manage to become even more complicated when the boy and girl decide to meet in person.

title: Coco
simple_desc: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
simple_desc: After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.

title: Toy Story
simple_desc: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

title: Toy Story 3
simple_desc: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

title: Princess Mononoke
simple_desc: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
simple_desc: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

title: Howl's Moving Castle
simple_desc: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

title: Pan's Labyrinth
simple_desc: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
simple_desc: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

title: Demon Slayer the Movie: Mugen Train
simple_desc: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.

title: Tumbbad
simple_desc: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

title: Klaus
simple_desc: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

title: Ugetsu
simple_desc: A tale of ambition, family, love, and war set in the midst of the Japanese Civil Wars of the sixteenth century.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
simple_desc: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
simple_desc: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

title: Ratatouille
simple_desc: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

title: The Wizard of Oz
simple_desc: Young Dorothy Gale and her dog Toto are swept away by a tornado from their Kansas farm to the magical Land of Oz, and embark on a quest with three new friends to see the Wizard, who can return her to her home and fulfill the others' wishes.
directors: ['Victor Fleming', 'George Cukor', 'Mervyn LeRoy', 'Norman Taurog', 'Richard Thorpe', 'King Vidor']

title: Inside Out
simple_desc: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
simple_desc: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

title: Monsters, Inc.
simple_desc: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

title: My Neighbor Totoro
simple_desc: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

title: The Seventh Seal
simple_desc: A knight returning to Sweden after the Crusades seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

title: Underground
simple_desc: A group of Serbian socialists prepares for the war in a surreal underground filled by parties, tragedies, love, and hate.

title: Wolf Children
simple_desc: After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies in an accident while hunting for food for their children, a young woman must find ways to raise the werewolf son and daughter that she had with him while keeping their trait hidden from society.

title: Time of the Gypsies
simple_desc: In this luminous tale set in the area around Sarajevo and in Italy, Perhan, an engaging young Romany (gypsy) with telekinetic powers, is seduced by the quick-cash world of petty crime, which threatens to destroy him and those he loves.

title: A Christmas Carol
simple_desc: Ebenezer Scrooge, a curmudgeonly, miserly businessman, has no time for sentimentality and largely views Christmas as a waste of time. However, this Christmas Eve he will be visited by three spirits who will show him the errors of his ways.

title: OMG: Oh My God!
simple_desc: A shopkeeper takes God to court when his shop is destroyed by an earthquake.

title: The Princess Bride
simple_desc: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

title: Zack Snyder's Justice League
simple_desc: Determined to ensure that Superman's ultimate sacrifice wasn't in vain, Bruce Wayne recruits a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.

title: Aladdin
simple_desc: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

title: Beauty and the Beast
simple_desc: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

title: Akira
simple_desc: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.

title: Soul
simple_desc: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

title: Groundhog Day
simple_desc: A narcissistic, self-centered weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day, and the day keeps repeating until he gets it right.

title: Big Fish
simple_desc: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

title: Pink Floyd: The Wall
simple_desc: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.

title: Castle in the Sky
simple_desc: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

title: Wings of Desire
simple_desc: An angel tires of his purely ethereal life of merely overseeing the human activity of Berlin's residents, and longs for the tangible joys of physical existence when he falls in love with a mortal.

title: Wolfwalkers
simple_desc: A young apprentice hunter and her father journey to Ireland to help wipe out the last wolf pack. But everything changes when she befriends a free-spirited girl from a mysterious tribe rumored to transform into wolves by night.

title: The Tale of The Princess Kaguya
simple_desc: Found inside a shining stalk of bamboo by an old bamboo cutter and his wife, a tiny girl grows rapidly into an exquisite young lady. The mysterious young princess enthralls all who encounter her, but ultimately she must confront her fate, the punishment for her crime.

title: Song of the Sea
simple_desc: Ben, a young Irish boy, and his little sister Saoirse, a girl who can turn into a seal, go on an adventure to free the fairies and save the spirit world.

title: Stairway to Heaven
simple_desc: A British wartime aviator who cheats death must argue for his life before a celestial court, hoping to prolong his fledgling romance with an American girl.

title: The Exterminating Angel
simple_desc: The guests at an upper-class dinner party find themselves unable to leave.

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
simple_desc: Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard.

title: Avatar
simple_desc: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
simple_desc: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

title: Shrek
simple_desc: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

title: Edward Scissorhands
simple_desc: The solitary life of an artificial man - who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands - is upended when he is taken in by a suburban family.

title: Life of Pi
simple_desc: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

title: Toy Story 2
simple_desc: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
simple_desc: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

title: The Man from Earth
simple_desc: An impromptu goodbye party for Professor John Oldman becomes a mysterious interrogation after the retiring scholar reveals to his colleagues he has a longer and stranger past than they can imagine.

title: Nosferatu
simple_desc: Vampire Count Orlok expresses interest in a new residence and real estate agent Hutter's wife.

title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
simple_desc: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

title: Let the Right One In
simple_desc: Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

title: Harvey
simple_desc: Due to his insistence that he has an invisible six foot-tall rabbit for a best friend, a whimsical middle-aged man is thought by his family to be insane - but he may be wiser than anyone knows.

title: Beauty and the Beast
simple_desc: A beautiful young woman takes her father's place as the prisoner of a mysterious beast, who wishes to marry her.

title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
simple_desc: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.
stars: ['Michelle Yeoh', 'Stephanie Hsu', 'Jamie Lee Curtis', 'Ke Huy Quan']

title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
simple_desc: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with consequences.

title: About Time
simple_desc: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
simple_desc: A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.

title: Ghostbusters
simple_desc: Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.

title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
simple_desc: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.

title: The Holy Mountain
simple_desc: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a messianic character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.

title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
simple_desc: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.

title: Mary Poppins
simple_desc: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

title: Kiki's Delivery Service
simple_desc: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

title: The Fall
simple_desc: In a hospital on the outskirts of 1920s Los Angeles, an injured stuntman begins to tell a fellow patient, a little girl with a broken arm, a fantastic story of five mythical heroes. Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality blurs as the tale advances.

title: Paddington 2
simple_desc: Paddington, now happily settled with the Brown family and a popular member of the local community, picks up a series of odd jobs to buy the perfect present for his Aunt Lucy's 100th birthday, only for the gift to be stolen.

title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
simple_desc: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen 0
simple_desc: Yuta Okkotsu, a high schooler who gains control of an extremely powerful Cursed Spirit and gets enrolled in the Tokyo Prefectural Jujutsu High School by Jujutsu Sorcerers to help him control his power and keep an eye on him.

title: Ninja Scroll
simple_desc: A vagabond swordsman is aided by a kunoichi and a spy in battling a demonic clan of killers - led by a ghost from his past - who are bent on overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate.

title: Millennium Actress
simple_desc: A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.

title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
simple_desc: In 1900, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.

title: Minnal Murali
simple_desc: An unusual event creates a lightning which in turns gives superhuman abilies to an ambitious tailor ,whose responsibility is now to protect his home village from the evil plans of the antagonist.

title: Ernest & Celestine
simple_desc: The story of an unlikely friendship between a bear, Ernest, and a young mouse named Celestine.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
simple_desc: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
simple_desc: Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
simple_desc: As Harry, Ron and Hermione race against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, they uncover the existence of the three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

title: Tangled
simple_desc: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

title: Coraline
simple_desc: An adventurous 11-year-old girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

title: The Lego Movie
simple_desc: An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

title: Toy Story 4
simple_desc: When a new toy called "Forky" joins Woody and the gang, a road trip alongside old and new friends reveals how big the world can be for a toy.

title: Mr. Nobody
simple_desc: A boy stands on a station platform as a train is about to leave. Should he go with his mother or stay with his father? Infinite possibilities arise from this decision. As long as he doesn't choose, anything is possible.

title: Wreck-It Ralph
simple_desc: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

title: Midnight in Paris
simple_desc: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
simple_desc: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

title: Kung Fu Hustle
simple_desc: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious "Axe Gang" while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.

title: Being John Malkovich
simple_desc: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

title: Paprika
simple_desc: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.

title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
simple_desc: When Stan Marsh and his friends go see an R-rated movie, they start cursing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

title: Fantasia
simple_desc: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music, ranging from the abstract to depictions of mythology and fantasy, and settings including the prehistoric, supernatural and sacred.
directors: ['James Algar', 'Samuel Armstrong', 'Ford Beebe Jr.', 'Norman Ferguson', 'David Hand', 'Jim Handley', 'T. Hee', 'Wilfred Jackson', 'Hamilton Luske', 'Bill Roberts', 'Paul Satterfield', 'Ben Sharpsteen']

title: Kubo and the Two Strings
simple_desc: A young boy named Kubo must locate a magical suit of armour worn by his late father in order to defeat a vengeful spirit from the past.

title: Porco Rosso
simple_desc: In 1930s Italy, a veteran World War I pilot is cursed to look like an anthropomorphic pig.

title: Waking Life
simple_desc: A man shuffles through a dream meeting various people and discussing the meanings and purposes of the universe.

title: The Little Prince
simple_desc: A little girl lives in a very grown-up world with her mother, who tries to prepare her for it. Her neighbor, the Aviator, introduces the girl to an extraordinary world where anything is possible, the world of the Little Prince.

title: The Double Life of Véronique
simple_desc: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.

title: Dreams
simple_desc: A collection of tales based upon eight of director Akira Kurosawa's recurring dreams.

title: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
simple_desc: A high-school girl named Makoto acquires the power to travel back in time, and decides to use it for her own personal benefits. Little does she know that she is affecting the lives of others just as much as she is her own.

title: Dragon Ball Super: Broly
simple_desc: Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.

title: The Purple Rose of Cairo
simple_desc: In 1935 New Jersey, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.

title: Eega
simple_desc: A murdered man is reincarnated as a housefly and seeks to avenge his death.

title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
simple_desc: The Muppets present their own touching rendition of Charles Dickens' classic tale.

title: Magadheera
simple_desc: A warrior gets reincarnated 400 years later, after trying to save the princess and the kingdom, who also dies along with him. He then sets back again to fight against all odds and win back his love.

title: The Little Mermaid
simple_desc: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.
stars: ['Jodi Benson', 'Samuel E. Wright', 'Rene Auberjonois', 'Christopher Daniel Barnes']

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
simple_desc: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

title: Moana
simple_desc: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
simple_desc: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.

title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
simple_desc: Three years into the Clone Wars, Obi-Wan pursues a new threat, while Anakin is lured by Chancellor Palpatine into a sinister plot to rule the galaxy.

title: Guillermo del Toro's Pinocchio
simple_desc: A father's wish magically brings a wooden boy to life in Italy, giving him a chance to care for the child.

title: Stardust
simple_desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

title: Mulan
simple_desc: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

title: Kung Fu Panda
simple_desc: To everyone's surprise, including his own, Po, an overweight, clumsy panda, is chosen as protector of the Valley of Peace. His suitability will soon be tested as the valley's arch-enemy is on his way.

title: Dark City
simple_desc: A man struggles with memories of his past, which include a wife he cannot remember and a nightmarish world no one else ever seems to wake up from.

title: Ponyo
simple_desc: A five-year-old boy develops a relationship with Ponyo, a young goldfish princess who longs to become a human after falling in love with him.

title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
simple_desc: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.
directors: ['William Cottrell', 'David Hand', 'Wilfred Jackson', 'Larry Morey', 'Perce Pearce', 'Ben Sharpsteen']

title: The Secret World of Arrietty
simple_desc: The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their teenage daughter Arrietty is discovered.

title: Interstate 60: Episodes of the Road
simple_desc: Neal Oliver, a very confused young man and an artist, takes a journey of a lifetime on a highway I60 that doesn't exist on any of the maps, going to the places he never even heard of, searching for an answer and his dreamgirl.

title: A Little Princess
simple_desc: Sara is sent to a strict boarding school after her father enlists in WWI. When he is presumed dead, the headmistress, knowing she will not receive any more money, forces the girl to become a servant.

title: Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust
simple_desc: A legendary dhampir competes with a motley family of bounty hunters to return a young woman, who has been seemingly abducted by a vampire, to her family.

title: The Boy and the Beast
simple_desc: When a young orphaned boy living on the streets of Shibuya stumbles upon a fantastic world of beasts, he's taken in by a gruff warrior beast looking for an apprentice.

title: Beetlejuice
simple_desc: The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, and hire a malicious spirit to drive them out.

title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
simple_desc: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
simple_desc: In a magically realistic version of Toronto, a young man must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes one by one in order to win her heart.

title: Doctor Strange
simple_desc: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

title: The Crow
simple_desc: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

title: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
simple_desc: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.

title: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
simple_desc: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

title: Field of Dreams
simple_desc: Iowa farmer Ray Kinsella is inspired by a voice he can't ignore to pursue a dream he can hardly believe. Supported by his wife, Ray begins the quest by turning his ordinary cornfield into a place where dreams can come true.

title: Hugo
simple_desc: In 1931 Paris, an orphan living in the walls of a train station gets wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father and an automaton.

title: The Illusionist
simple_desc: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

title: Weathering with You
simple_desc: Set during a period of exceptionally rainy weather, high-school boy Hodaka Morishima runs away from his troubled rural home to Tokyo and befriends an orphan girl who can manipulate the weather.

title: Braindead
simple_desc: A young man's mother is bitten by a Sumatran rat-monkey. She gets sick and dies, at which time she comes back to life, killing and eating dogs, nurses, friends, and neighbors.

title: Pleasantville
simple_desc: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves transported to a 1950s sitcom where their influence begins to profoundly change that colorless, complacent world.

title: The Fisher King
simple_desc: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

title: The Secret of NIMH
simple_desc: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she suspected.

title: Stranger Than Fiction
simple_desc: I.R.S. auditor Harold Crick suddenly finds his mundane Chicago life to be the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire existence, from his work to his love life to his death.

title: Pinocchio
simple_desc: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.
directors: ['Norman Ferguson', 'T. Hee', 'Wilfred Jackson', 'Jack Kinney', 'Hamilton Luske', 'Bill Roberts', 'Ben Sharpsteen']

title: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
simple_desc: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.

title: Dead Man
simple_desc: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange aboriginal American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

title: The City of Lost Children
simple_desc: A scientist in a surrealist society kidnaps children to steal their dreams, hoping that they slow his aging process.

title: Death Note
simple_desc: A battle between the world's two greatest minds begins when Light Yagami finds the Death Note, a notebook with the power to kill, and decides to rid the world of criminals.

title: The Secret of Kells
simple_desc: A young boy in a remote medieval outpost under siege from barbarian raids is beckoned to adventure when a celebrated master illuminator arrives with an ancient book, brimming with secret wisdom and powers.

title: On Body and Soul
simple_desc: When slaughterhouse workers Endre and Mária discover they share the same dreams, where they meet in a forest as deer and fall in love, they decide to make their dreams come true, but it's difficult in real life.

title: The Red Turtle
simple_desc: A man is shipwrecked on a deserted island and encounters a red turtle, which changes his life.

title: I Lost My Body
simple_desc: A story of Naoufel, a young man who is in love with Gabrielle. In another part of town, a severed hand escapes from a dissection lab, determined to find its body again.

title: The Illusionist
simple_desc: A French illusionist finds himself out of work and travels to Scotland, where he meets a young woman. Their ensuing adventure changes both their lives forever.

title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
simple_desc: Shang-Chi, the master of weaponry-based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organization.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
simple_desc: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.

title: The Lighthouse
simple_desc: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

title: The Jungle Book
simple_desc: After a threat from the tiger Shere Khan forces him to flee the jungle, a man-cub named Mowgli embarks on a journey of self discovery with the help of panther Bagheera and free-spirited bear Baloo.

title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
simple_desc: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

title: Frozen
simple_desc: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

title: Wonder Woman
simple_desc: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

title: Luca
simple_desc: On the Italian Riviera, an unlikely but strong friendship grows between a human being and a sea monster disguised as a human.

title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
simple_desc: Bilbo and company are forced to engage in a war against an array of combatants and keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness.

title: Palm Springs
simple_desc: Stuck in a time loop, two wedding guests develop a budding romance while living the same day over and over again.

title: The Emperor's New Groove
simple_desc: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
simple_desc: When Hiccup discovers Toothless isn't the only Night Fury, he must seek "The Hidden World", a secret Dragon Utopia before a hired tyrant named Grimmel finds it first.

title: Onward
simple_desc: In a magical world full of technological advances, elven brothers Ian and Barley Lightfoot set out on an adventure to resurrect their late father for a day.

title: Mirage
simple_desc: Two storms separated by 25 years. A woman murdered. A daughter missed. Only 72 hours to discover the truth.

title: A Monster Calls
simple_desc: Conor, a twelve-year-old boy, encounters an ancient tree monster who proceeds to help him cope with his mother's terminal illness and being bullied in school.

title: Dracula
simple_desc: Transylvanian vampire Count Dracula bends a naive real estate agent to his will, then takes up residence at a London estate where he sleeps in his coffin by day and searches for potential victims by night.

title: A Dog's Journey
simple_desc: A dog finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he meets.

title: Yellow Submarine
simple_desc: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred in his yellow submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music-hating Blue Meanies.

title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
simple_desc: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers embark on an epic quest to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.

title: Doctor Sleep
simple_desc: Years following the events of The Shining (1980), a now-adult Dan Torrance must protect a young girl with similar powers from a cult known as The True Knot, who prey on children with powers to remain immortal.

title: Hercules
simple_desc: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

title: Big
simple_desc: After wishing to be made big, a teenage boy wakes the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.

title: Excalibur
simple_desc: Merlin the magician helps Arthur Pendragon unite the Britons around the Round Table of Camelot, even as dark forces conspire to tear it apart.

title: The Shape of Water
simple_desc: At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
simple_desc: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.

title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
simple_desc: When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he ever imagined.

title: Lilo & Stitch
simple_desc: A young and parentless girl adopts a 'dog' from the local pound, completely unaware that it's supposedly a dangerous scientific experiment that's taken refuge on Earth and is now hiding from its creator and those who see it as a menace.

title: Raya and the Last Dragon
simple_desc: In a realm known as Kumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, a warrior named Raya is determined to find the last dragon.

title: Labyrinth
simple_desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah is given thirteen hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue her baby brother Toby when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King Jareth.

title: Shrek 2
simple_desc: Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona's parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be.

title: Gremlins
simple_desc: A young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

title: The NeverEnding Story
simple_desc: A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

title: The Lego Batman Movie
simple_desc: A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.

title: Sleepy Hollow
simple_desc: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people; the culprit is legendary apparition The Headless Horseman.

title: Dogma
simple_desc: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to exploit a loop-hole and reenter Heaven.

title: Peter Pan
simple_desc: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

title: Eraserhead
simple_desc: Henry Spencer tries to survive his industrial environment, his angry girlfriend, and the unbearable screams of his newly born mutant child.

title: Across the Universe
simple_desc: The music of The Beatles and the Vietnam War form the backdrop for the romance between an upper-class American girl and a poor Liverpudlian artist.

title: Cinderella
simple_desc: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq and from her Fairy Godmother.

title: Paddington
simple_desc: A young Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home. Finding himself lost and alone at Paddington Station, he meets the kindly Brown family, who offer him a temporary haven.

title: Corpse Bride
simple_desc: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

title: The Last Unicorn
simple_desc: A beautiful unicorn sets out to learn if she truly is the last of her kind in this sparkling animated musical.

title: The Secret Garden
simple_desc: A young, recently-orphaned girl is sent to England after living in India all of her life. Once there, she begins to explore her new, seemingly-isolated surroundings, and its secrets.

title: Alice in Wonderland
simple_desc: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

title: Shaolin Soccer
simple_desc: A young Shaolin follower reunites with his discouraged brothers to form a soccer team using their martial art skills to their advantage.

title: Jason and the Argonauts
simple_desc: The legendary Greek hero leads a team of intrepid adventurers in a perilous quest for the legendary Golden Fleece.

title: Phantom of the Paradise
simple_desc: A disfigured composer sells his soul for the woman he loves so that she will perform his music. However, an evil record tycoon betrays him and steals his music to open his rock palace, The Paradise.

title: The Brave Little Toaster
simple_desc: A group of dated appliances embark on a journey to the city to find their master after being abandoned in a cabin in the woods.

title: Pom Poko
simple_desc: A community of magical shape-shifting raccoon dogs struggle to prevent their forest home from being destroyed by urban development.

title: Shaun the Sheep Movie
simple_desc: When Shaun decides to take the day off and have some fun, he gets a little more action than he bargained for. A mix up with the Farmer, a caravan and a very steep hill lead them all to the Big City and it's up to Shaun and the flock to return everyone safely to the green grass of home.

title: A.R.O.G
simple_desc: Commander Logar fools Arif and sends him 1.000.000 years back in the time. He must civilize people from past to reach today.

title: The Little Mermaid
simple_desc: A young mermaid makes a deal with a sea witch to trade her beautiful voice for human legs so she can discover the world above water and impress a prince.

title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
simple_desc: A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother, Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.

title: Encanto
simple_desc: A Colombian teenage girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

title: Meet Joe Black
simple_desc: Death, who takes the form of a young man killed in an accident, asks a media mogul to act as his guide to teach him about life on Earth and, in the process, he falls in love with the mogul's daughter.

title: The Age of Adaline
simple_desc: A young woman, born at the turn of the 20th century, is rendered ageless after an accident. After many solitary years, she meets a man who complicates the eternal life she has settled into.

title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
simple_desc: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

title: Big Trouble in Little China
simple_desc: A rough-and-tumble trucker and his side kick face off with an ancient sorcerer in a supernatural battle beneath Chinatown.

title: A Bug's Life
simple_desc: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

title: Bridge to Terabithia
simple_desc: A preteen's life turns upside down when he befriends the new girl in school and they imagine a whole new fantasy world to escape reality.

title: Treasure Planet
simple_desc: In this science fiction rendering of the classic novel "Treasure Island", Jim Hawkins (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) is a rebellious teen seen by the world as an aimless slacker. After he receives ...                See full summary »

title: Willow
simple_desc: A young farmer is chosen to undertake a perilous journey in order to protect a special baby from an evil queen.

title: Enter the Void
simple_desc: An American drug dealer living in Tokyo is betrayed by his best friend and killed in a drug deal. His soul, observing the repercussions of his death, seeks resurrection.
stars: ['Nathaniel Brown', 'Paz de la Huerta', 'Cyril Roy', 'Olly Alexander']

title: The Croods
simple_desc: After their cave is destroyed, a caveman family must trek through an unfamiliar fantastical world with the help of an inventive boy.

title: The Prince of Egypt
simple_desc: Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

title: Monsters University
simple_desc: A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski (Billy Crystal) and James P. "Sully" Sullivan (John Goodman) during their days at Monsters University, when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.

title: Kung Fu Panda 2
simple_desc: Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.

title: Sleeping Beauty
simple_desc: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.

title: The Book of Life
simple_desc: Manolo, a young man who is torn between fulfilling the expectations of his family and following his heart, embarks on an adventure that spans three fantastic worlds where he must face his greatest fears.

title: Somewhere in Time
simple_desc: A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.

title: Rise of the Guardians
simple_desc: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.

title: Only Lovers Left Alive
simple_desc: A depressed musician reunites with his lover. Though their romance, which has already endured several centuries, is disrupted by the arrival of her uncontrollable younger sister.

title: Christopher Robin
simple_desc: A working-class family man, Christopher Robin, encounters his childhood friend Winnie-the-Pooh, who helps him to rediscover the joys of life.

title: Wish Dragon
simple_desc: Determined teen Din is longing to reconnect with his childhood best friend when he meets a wish-granting dragon who shows him the magic of possibilities.

title: A Dog's Purpose
simple_desc: A dog looks to discover his purpose in life over the course of several lifetimes and owners.

title: The Hudsucker Proxy
simple_desc: A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
simple_desc: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

title: Ruby Sparks
simple_desc: A novelist struggling with writer's block finds romance in a most unusual way: by creating a female character he thinks will love him, then willing her into existence.

title: Dumbo
simple_desc: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.
directors: ['Samuel Armstrong', 'Norman Ferguson', 'Wilfred Jackson', 'Jack Kinney', 'Bill Roberts', 'Ben Sharpsteen', 'John Elliotte']

title: The Witcher: Nightmare of the Wolf
simple_desc: Escaping from poverty to become a witcher, Vesemir slays monsters for coin and glory, but when a new menace rises, he must face the demons of his past.

title: Wristcutters: A Love Story
simple_desc: A film set in a strange afterlife way station that has been reserved for people who have committed suicide.

title: Arizona Dream
simple_desc: A young New Yorker goes to Arizona where he finds freedom to both love and dream.

title: Cat People
simple_desc: An American man marries a Serbian immigrant who fears that she will turn into the cat person of her homeland's fables if they are intimate together.

title: Russian Ark
simple_desc: A 19th century French aristocrat, notorious for his scathing memoirs about life in Russia, travels through the Russian State Hermitage Museum and encounters historical figures from the last 200+ years.

title: Beasts of the Southern Wild
simple_desc: Faced with both her hot-tempered father's fading health and melting ice-caps that flood her ramshackle bayou community and unleash ancient aurochs, six-year-old Hushpuppy must learn the ways of courage and love.

title: Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children
simple_desc: An ex-mercenary is forced out of isolation when three mysterious men kidnap and brainwash the city's children afflicted with the Geostigma disease.

title: The Science of Sleep
simple_desc: A man entranced by his dreams and imagination is love-struck with a French woman and feels he can show her his world.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection "F"
simple_desc: One peaceful day on Earth, two remnants of Freeza's army named Sorube and Tagoma arrive searching for the Dragon Balls with the aim of reviving Freeza. They succeed, and Freeza subsequently seeks revenge on the Saiya-jin.

title: Beauty and the Beast
simple_desc: A selfish Prince is cursed to become a monster for the rest of his life, unless he learns to fall in love with a beautiful young woman he keeps prisoner.
